column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Hillary - Thanks for your great review. I'm very glad you enjoyed our fare
column2: though I'm curious to know if you were aware of our new Spicy Vegan Ramen. We introduced this and some other new menu items on Tuesday of last week
column3: so hopefully you can come back and give it a try if you missed it. Regardless
column4: we appreciate you and your friends trying us out
column5: and we hope to see you again soon.
